attributes.action: put forward Jayne Torvill and Christopher Dean for knighthoods, in recognition of their achievements in sport .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In 2009 Torvill and Dean marked the 25th Anniversary of their Olympic Gold in Sarajevo for the now famous 'Bolero' routine. Their achievements have never been surpassed by any other English dance pair.
They have continued in the last four years to encourage people to take up skating via their 'Dancing on Ice' program.

It really is time to properly recognise their achievements in sport.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
